text: Smilen Mlyakov (; born 17 June 1981 in Sofia) is a Bulgarian volleyball player. ==Career== Mlyakov has played for CSKA Royal Cake and Levski Ball in his country as well as had spells in Italy, Poland and Iran. He is a former member of his country's national team. ==References== ==External links== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Sofia Category:Bulgarian men's volleyball players
title: Smilen Mlyakov
